Package edu.ntnu.service

Class QuizService

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.service.QuizService
@Service public class QuizService extends Object
Service class for Quiz objects.

  • Constructor Details

    • QuizService

      @Autowired public QuizService(QuizRepository quizRepository, MultipleChoiceQuestionDAORepository multipleChoiceRepository, TextInputQuestionDAORepository textInputRepository, DragDropQuestionDAORepository dragDropRepository, TrueFalseQuestionDAORepository trueFalseRepository, QuizMapper quizMapper, QuestionService questionService)
      Constructor for the QuizService.
      Parameters:
      quizRepository - the repository for the QuizDAO objects
      multipleChoiceRepository - the repository for the MultipleChoiceQuestionDAO objects
      textInputRepository - the repository for the TextInputQuestionDAO objects
      dragDropRepository - the repository for the DragDropQuestionDAO objects
      trueFalseRepository - the repository for the TrueFalseQuestionDAO objects
      quizMapper - the mapper for the Quiz objects
      questionService - the service for the Question objects

  • Method Details

    • getQuiz

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<QuizDTO> getQuiz(Long quizId)
      Method to get a quiz by quizId from the database. If the quiz is found, the status code is 200. If the quiz is not found, the status code is 404. If an error occurs, the status code is 500.
      Parameters:
      quizId - The quizId of the quiz to get.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the Quiz object and status code.

    • getAllQuizzes

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Iterable<QuizDTO>> getAllQuizzes(String username)
      Method to get all quizzes from the database. If quizzes are found, the status code is 200. If no quizzes are found, the status code is 404. If an error occurs, the status code is 500.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a list of Quiz objects and status code.

    • createQuiz

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<QuizDTO> createQuiz(QuizDTO quizDTO)
      Method to create a quiz from a QuizDTO object. Saves the quiz to the database. If the quiz is created successfully, the status code is 200. If an error occurs, the status code is 500.
      Parameters:
      quizDTO - The QuizDTO object to create the quiz from.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the Quiz object and status code.

    • deleteQuiz

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteQuiz(Long quizId)
      Method to update a quiz from a QuizDTO object. Updates the quiz in the database. If the quiz is updated successfully, the status code is 200. If an error occurs, the status code is 500.
      Parameters:
      quizId - The quizId of the quiz to delete.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the Quiz object and status code.

    • deleteQuizFromQuizId

      public void deleteQuizFromQuizId(Long quizId)
      Method to delete a quiz from the database. Deletes the quiz and all questions associated with the quiz.
      Parameters:
      quizId - The quizId of the quiz to delete.

    • getAllPublicQuizzes

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Iterable<QuizDTO>> getAllPublicQuizzes()
      Method to get all public quizzes from the database. If public quizzes are found, the status code is 200. If no public quizzes are found, the status code is 404. If an error occurs, the status code is 500.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a list of Quiz objects and status code.

    • updateQuiz

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<QuizDTO> updateQuiz(QuizDTO quizDTO)
      Method to update a quiz from a QuizDTO object. Updates the quiz in the database. If the quiz is updated successfully, the status code is 200. If an error occurs, the status code is 500.
      Parameters:
      quizDTO - The QuizDTO object to update the quiz from.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the Quiz object and status code.

    • getAllPublicQuizzesByTag

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Iterable<QuizDTO>> getAllPublicQuizzesByTag(Long tagId)

    • getAllPublicQuizzesBySearchString

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Iterable<QuizDTO>> getAllPublicQuizzesBySearchString(String searchString)
